title: Neptune 8.0 “Juna” Is Here Based on Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm”
description:
Neptune 8.0 distribution is now available for download based on Debian GNU/Linux 12 "Bookworm" and featuring the latest KDE Plasma 5.27 LTS desktop environment.

The post Neptune 8.0 “Juna” Is Here Based on Debian GNU/Linux 12 “Bookworm” appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Inkscape 1.3 Open-Source SVG Editor Is Out with New Shape Builder Tool, Many Changes
description:
Inkscape 1.3 open-source scalable vector graphics editor is now available for download with new Shape Builder Tool and many improvements. Here's what's new!

The post Inkscape 1.3 Open-Source SVG Editor Is Out with New Shape Builder Tool, Many Changes appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.

title: Shotwell 0.32.2 Image Viewer Adds Support for HEIF Files with .HIF Extension
description:
Shotwell 0.32.2 open-source image viewer is now available for download with support for HEIF image files with the .HIF extension, improved Flatpak support, and bug fixes.

The post Shotwell 0.32.2 Image Viewer Adds Support for HEIF Files with .HIF Extension appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
